name: amasty/xsearch
description: Search Autocomplete / Advanced Search by Amasty

suggest.amasty/module-xsearch-mftf-3: Install xsearch-mftf-3 module to be able to run Advanced Search MFTF tests for Magento 2.4.0+ version
suggest.amasty/module-store-locator-advanced-sea: Install this package in order to use the Store Locations search functionality.
